name.baseName: Grain ; Diesel fuel ; Drying ; All sizes; NESPS2
粮食 ; 柴油 ; 烘干 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisS12 Others (sodium alkali method)，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本工业流程包括使用柴油燃料烘干各种规模的谷物。该数据集包含的末端污染管理技术旨在减少颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）和二氧化硫（SO2）排放。这些技术包括多种颗粒物过滤和气体处理方法，如喷淋塔/水冲击浴，离心水膜，布袋过滤器，文丘里洗涤器，以及用于二氧化硫减排的石灰/石膏法，双碱法，烟气循环流化床法，旋转喷雾干燥法，氨法，S12其他（钠碱法）及氧化镁法。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码05,四级代码0514文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isBag filter，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management99.6
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是袋式除尘，其效率为99.6，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行小时数/热风炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution particles (PM2.5 - PM10)isCentrifugal water film，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management87
污染物指标颗粒物的末端治理技术是离心水膜，其效率为87，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=除尘设施年运行小时数/热风炉年运行小时数。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为颗粒物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为颗粒物

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match the work of matching it to the LCAflow library in the face of the most compatible flow, pollutant indicator note for sulfur dioxide original description of the coefficient of production of 19 S. Please modify the corresponding emissions according to the notes of their own calculations.
污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫原文描述的产污系数为 19S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideisAmmonia method，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 19S。Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.。.The original article describes the pollution production coefficients as 19S. Please revise the corresponding emissions after accounting for them according to the notes.
